feature.label: GOAL Eclipse
feature.description: GOAL is an agent programming language for developing cognitive agents. GOAL agents derive their choice of action from their beliefs and goals. The language facilitates the development of autonomous decision-making agents that are part of a multi-agent system and that interact with their environment. The language provides an intuitive programming framework based on common folk psychological notions and basic practical reasoning.
